summary: This tag focuses on the concept of organizations, particularly how modern organizational structures are evolving to be non-linear and decentralized, similar to ecosystems in biology. The resources explore new frameworks for designing and managing these distributed systems, emphasizing the integration of diverse disciplines to create thriving, boundary-less networks.
excerpt: Ecosystems now symbolize decentralized, non-linear organizations. Ecosystem Architecture integrates diverse disciplines to craft thriving, boundary-less networks.
